inclusion.criterion: History of syncope and/or presyncope in the absence of prodromal symptoms typical of vagally-mediated events
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: LV end diastolic diameter >60mm on echocardiography
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Presence of non-sustained ventricular tachycardia on 24-hour electrocardiography
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
